Bade **Twitter:** [https://twitter.com/MTBade @MTBade] **Website:** [http://mtbade.com mtbade.com] **Ko-fi:** [https://ko-fi.com/mtbade ko-fi.com/mtbade] **About:** Hi, I'm M.T., and I write stories when I'm not procrastinating on writing stories. In real life, I'm a former physicist and law school graduate working to escape from Hell (aka Arizona). In addition to writing for this site, I also write original short fiction for professional publication, and occasionally blog about the idiosyncrasies of the Grand Canyon State. **Who Gets My Stuff If I Vanish:** In the event of my timely or untimely demise (probably by bus), mysterious or obvious disappearance, or political exile, which shall be assumed if I cannot be reached via Discord or Wikidot PM for a period of at least 366 days, then the following site members may serve as literary executors with custodianship over my works, including all scrapped and/or unfinished drafts and any future story ideas: [[user TyGently]], and/or [[user Jacob Conwell]], and/or [[user ch00bakka]], and/or [[user Anorrack]], and/or [[user intercedent]]. If several of these users want to take over custodianship of my works, I leave it up to them to work out a suitable arrangement, subject to majority vote of all available executors. In the event of a tied vote, the executor first listed above shall have the authority to break the tie. Any literary executor named here may designate a replacement for themself to assume these duties in the event of their own disappearance, but I reserve the right while I remain active on the site to repudiate and rescind such designation with or without cause. In so much as is possible, practicable, and applicable, this living will shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Arizona. Offer void where prohibited. Not for individual resale. Do not crush, cut, or eat. This is not a place of honor. Drop and run.
